title: Settle Down
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Settle Down par David Zincke
From the west I run to the safety of 

The fallen song in my gun 

As my father says hold on 



There's only so many times I can recount what I've denied

As I face what I've become 



As my mother says what's done is done 



Settle down my son 

You only die once 



Through symphonies and tortured seas

I rest upon this breeze 

But the echo carries on 




Oh nothing can be wrong 

Oh nothing can be wrong 



Settle down my son 

You only die once 



So believe what I say you can get lost in just a day 

When that bridge that you burned has gone 

Even your brother says so long 



Settle down my son 

you only die once 

You can see 

what you want it to be
